title: Tobies experience explain'd: Good fellows all, whatever you be, I pray take this advice of me: strength will decay old age will come, therefore save something while your yong [sic] To the tune of, That dill doul
author: Bowne, Tobias.
publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, in West-smithfield
notes: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "Good fellows all I pray draw near ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
